content:
WorkflowTheme Class

Definition

Provides the look and feel property settings to a workflow in design-time environment.

In this Article

[System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated.  Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")]
public sealed class WorkflowTheme : IDisposable
Inheritance
System.Object
WorkflowTheme

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
Equals(Object,Object)
GetHashCode()
GetType()
MemberwiseClone()
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)
ToString()

Remarks

Note

This material discusses types and namespaces that are obsolete. For more information, see Deprecated Types in Windows Workflow Foundation 4.5.

Workflow themes define the look and feel of a workflow design surface. This includes background styles, foreground styles, fonts, and icons defined for the workflow.

A WorkflowTheme is a theme defined for a specific workflow. The AmbientTheme class can be used for default properties if a specific workflow theme is not desired.

Constructors

WorkflowTheme()

Initializes a new instance of the WorkflowTheme class.

public WorkflowTheme ();

Properties

AmbientTheme

Gets the AmbientTheme associated with the WorkflowTheme.

public System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme AmbientTheme { get; }
Value
AmbientTheme

An AmbientTheme that describes default values for the look and feel of the WorkflowTheme.

Remarks

The AmbientTheme describes the look and feel of a workflow design surface. This includes background styles, foreground styles, fonts, and icons defined for the workflow design surface.

ContainingFileDirectory

Gets the directory part of the stem.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.FilePath*.

public string ContainingFileDirectory { get; }
Value
String

The directory part of the stem.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.FilePath*.

Remarks

Use ContainingFileDirectory to get the directory part of the FilePath.

CurrentTheme

Gets or sets the current theme.

public static System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme CurrentTheme { get; set; }
Value
WorkflowTheme

A WorkflowTheme that is used for display settings.

Remarks

Use CurrentTheme to make changes to the theme used to display the workflow.

Description

Gets or sets the description of the theme.

public string Description { get; set; }
Value
String

The description of the theme.

Exceptions
InvalidOperationException

The property value cannot be set because the workflow theme is read-only.

DesignerThemes

Gets a list of designer themes associated with the workflow.

public System.Collections.IList DesignerThemes { get; }
Value
IList

A list of designer themes associated with the workflow.

Remarks

Use DesignerThemes to retrieve a list of designer themes that are associated with the workflow.

EnableChangeNotification

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to enable change notification.

public static bool EnableChangeNotification { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true to enable change notification; otherwise, false.

Remarks

Enabling change notification causes the theme changed events to occur when changes to the theme are made.

FilePath

Gets or sets the file path for the theme.

public string FilePath { get; set; }
Value
String

The file path for the theme.

Exceptions
InvalidOperationException

The property value cannot be set because the workflow theme is read-only.

Remarks

The FilePath represents the path to the file that stores the theme settings.

LookupPath

Gets the file path from the registry.

public static string LookupPath { get; }
Value
String

The file path from the registry to the theme.

Remarks

The FilePath represents the path to the file that stores the theme settings.

Name

Gets or sets the name of the theme.

public string Name { get; set; }
Value
String

The name of the theme.

Exceptions
InvalidOperationException

The property value cannot be set because the workflow theme is read-only.

Remarks

Use the name to uniquely identify the theme among other themes.

ReadOnly

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the workflow theme is read-only.

public bool ReadOnly { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if the workflow theme is read-only; otherwise, false. The default is false.

RegistryKeyPath

Gets the registry key path for the theme.

public static string RegistryKeyPath { get; }
Value
String

The registry key path for the theme.

Remarks

Use the registry key to provide a unique place in the Windows registry to save theme information.

StandardThemes

Gets the list of standard themes.

public static System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ThemeType,string[]> StandardThemes { get; }
Value
IDictionary<ThemeType,String[]>

A list of available themes.

Type

Gets the type of the theme.

public System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ThemeType Type { get; }
Value
ThemeType

The ThemeType of the theme. Possible values are Default, System, and UserDefined.

Version

Gets or sets the version of the theme.

public string Version { get; set; }
Value
String

The version information for the theme.

Exceptions
InvalidOperationException

The property value cannot be set because the workflow theme is read-only.

Remarks

Use the version information to indicate successive improvements to a named theme.

Methods

Clone()

Creates a duplicate theme.

public System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme Clone ();
Returns
WorkflowTheme

An object that represents the newly-cloned theme.

Remarks

Use Clone to create a duplicate theme with property settings that match the cloning theme.

CreateStandardTheme(ThemeType)

Creates a standard theme.

public static System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme CreateStandardTheme (System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ThemeType standardThemeType);
standardThemeType
ThemeType

The ThemeType of the standard theme to create.

Returns
WorkflowTheme

The newly created WorkflowTheme.

Remarks

Use CreateStandardTheme to create a new theme available anyone who uses the workflow designer.

Finalize()

When overridden in a derived class, allows an object to clean up any resources deterministically.

~WorkflowTheme ();

Remarks

This method cleans up resources by calling System.IDisposable.Dispose(false). Override System.IDisposable.Dispose to customize the cleanup.

GenerateThemeFilePath()

Generates a file path for the theme.

public static string GenerateThemeFilePath ();
Returns
String

A new, unique file path for the theme.

Remarks

Use GenerateThemeFilePath to create a unique file path for the theme.

GetDesignerTheme(ActivityDesigner)

Gets the theme for the specified ActivityDesigner.

public System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme GetDesignerTheme (System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner designer);
designer
ActivityDesigner

The activity designer from which to retrieve the theme.

Returns
ActivityDesignerTheme

The ActivityDesignerTheme associated with the specified ActivityDesigner.

Remarks

Use GetDesignerTheme to retrieve the theme associated with a specified activity designer.

Load(String)

Loads the theme from the specified file path.

public static System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme Load (string themeFilePath);
themeFilePath
String

The file path of the theme.

Returns
WorkflowTheme

A new WorkflowTheme loaded from the filename specified.

Load(IDesignerSerializationManager,String)

Loads a new theme from the specified path using a serialization manager.

public static System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme Load (System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager serializationManager, string themeFilePath);
serializationManager
IDesignerSerializationManager

The serialization manager to use to load the theme.

themeFilePath
String

The file path from which to load the theme.

Returns
WorkflowTheme

A new WorkflowTheme loaded from the file path specified using the serialization manager specified.

Remarks

If your theme requires custom serialization, use this method to load your method using your custom serialization manager.

LoadThemeSettingFromRegistry()

Loads a theme from the registry.

public static System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme LoadThemeSettingFromRegistry ();
Returns
WorkflowTheme

A WorkflowTheme loaded from the registry.

Remarks

LoadThemeSettingFromRegistry loads

Save(String)

Saves a theme to a file.

public void Save (string themeFilePath);
themeFilePath
String

The file in which to save the WorkflowTheme.

Remarks

Use Save to persist a theme to a file.

SaveThemeSettingToRegistry()

Saves a theme to the registry.

public static void SaveThemeSettingToRegistry ();

Remarks

Use SaveThemeSettingToRegistry to save the theme to the registry using the key specified by RegistryKeyPath.

Events

ThemeChanged

Occurs when a theme changes.

public static event EventHandler ThemeChanged;

Remarks

ThemeChanged occurs when properties of the theme changes, or when a theme is loaded.

Explicit Interface Implementations

IDisposable.Dispose()

Releases the managed resources used by the WorkflowTheme.

void IDisposable.Dispose ();
